FullPageDesc.message: Translate entire web pages from the context menu.

History_Content_List_OnEmpty.message: History of your translations will be here

History_Export_OnlyProDesc.message: Upgrade to the Pro version to export your history of translations into a CSV file

IDB_Error.message: Your browser has Indexed DB disabled

IDB_ErrorDesc.message:
Mate Translate requires Indexed DB (that's a local storage where we store all your translations and Phrasebook) to be enabled to work at full capacity.

Your browser seems to be in Private Browsing Mode which disables the Indexed DB (it's a Firefox bug #781982).

You may set History option on about:preferences#privacy to "Firefox will remember history". This might help but not guaranteed. Otherwise, you can contact Mozilla and ask to fix the aforesaid bug faster.

We are very sorry about the inconvenience but we unfortunately can do nothing with this.

Kernel_AppDescription.message: Your all-in-one translator for web pages, highlighted text & Netflix subtitles. Translate and learn words in 103 languages.

Login_ByClicking.message: By clicking on 'Create an account' you agree with our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Login_GDPR.message: We comply with GDPR, thus we can't provide you with our services until you accept our policies.

Login_NoAccountText.message: If you purchased the Pro but were not signed in at that time and did not finish the sign-up through a link we sent to the email you specified on checkout, you should finish the sign-up through the link from the email. After you finish it, you will be able to sign in in the app.

Login_NoRememberText.message: If you can't remember the email you used for checkout, try to find an email with purchase confirmation from us in your inbox.

Login_PasswordMin8.message: Your password should consist of at least 8 characters

Login_Promo.message: Sign in to use Mate and synchronize all your data across all devices!

Login_QuestionsText.message: If you are still experiencing difficulties, you can contact us at support@matetranslate.com.

Login_Restore.message: To restore Mate Translate Pro, sign in into account which you purchased it from (don't know it?)

Login_Sync.message: Please sign in or sign up to synchronize your history and the Phrasebook across all your devices

MatePro_Description.message: Bring your translation experience to a whole new level with Mate Pro! Pay once, use forever.

MicAccess_HowToUnlock.message: Delete $id$ from the blocked in the Microphone exceptions. Thereafter, click here.

MicAccess_Note.message: In order to recognize and translate speech, Mate Translate needs to have a permission to use your computer's microphone.

Pb_EmptyWl_Text1.message: Store all words you want to remember on this topic here.

Pb_EmptyWl_Text2.message: Just type in words, Mate will pull up translations for them.

Pb_Empty_Text1.message: Create word lists to store words you want to learn.

Pb_Empty_Text2.message: Keep all your vocabulary in one place!

Pb_EnterWordOrPhrase.message: Enter a word or a phrase ...

Pb_HowToAddPhrase.message: Use the text field above to add new phrases

Pb_HowToCreateWordlist.message: Click on the "+" button up there to create a new word list

Pb_LearnOnboardingDesc.message:
We want to keep Mate good for one purpose - translations.

So, we made Reji - a super simple free app to help with efficient vocabulary learning. We also made possible to export all your words from Mate to Reji in one click!

Pb_NewWlNote.message: Create a word list for a fixed language pair and add an unlimited amount of phrases into it.

Pb_NoInternet.message: Your Internet connection seems to be offline. To add new phrases, you need to be connected to the Internet!

Pb_NotOnIOS.message: Not using iOS? Click to learn words on Android or right in browser.

Pb_RejiAndroid.message: Reji for Android isn't available yet. We're working hard to ship it ASAP. However, you can be the first to know if you leave your email:

Pb_RejiBrowser.message: Reji's browser version isn't available yet. We're working hard to ship it ASAP. However, you can be the first to know if you leave your email:

Pb_ScanQR.message: Scan this QR code with the Camera app on your iPhone or iPad to open and learn words in Reji.

Pb_SureToDeleteWordlist.message: Are you sure that you want to delete this word list? This action cannot be undone.

Pro_ComesAlong.message: Comes along with other premium features:

Pro_DarkMode.message: Save energy and avoid eye strain with Mate's new slick dark mode.

Pro_DoubleClickFeature.message: Translate words on webpages by double-clicking on them with Mate Pro!

Pro_ExportFeature.message: Get your history as a CSV file with Mate Pro!

Pro_PhrasebookFeature.message:
Keep words you want to learn in Phrasebook, neatly organized.
Export to Reji or CSV files to practice.
Works with Mate for Netflix.

Pro_STTFeature.message: Mate can translate 40 languages as you speak in the toolbar window.

Pro_ShortcutsFeature.message: Translate selected text with keyboard shortcuts to multiple languages instead of just one (Shift+T).

Pro_SyncFeature.message: Synchronize all your data across all devices with Mate Pro!

RejiAd.message: Our new app will help you improve vocabulary. Check it out!

SafariWall_Desc.message: Pay for Mate one time and get all these awesome features right in your Safari.

SafariWall_Feature1.message: Select words on any page & translate them

SafariWall_Feature2.message: Double-click on any word & translate it

SafariWall_Feature3.message: Save words to remember in your personal Phrasebook

SafariWall_Feature6.message: Synchronize all your translations across all devices

SafariWall_Title.message: Don't tab to translation websites anymore!

Settings_21max.message: You can create 21 shortcuts at most...

Settings_Autoswap_Description.message: Languages will be automatically swapped if you enter text in target language instead of source language and vice versa.

Settings_CPDesc.message: Mate is available for iOS, Mac (+ Safari extension), Chrome, Firefox, Opera, and Edge. You can synchronize your translation history and Phrasebook between all apps with Mate Account.

Settings_CtxMenuDesc.message: Show a translation button in the context menu (right-click). Works for selected text on web pages.

Settings_DarkModeDesc.message: Save energy and avoid eye strain with Mate's new slick dark mode.

Settings_DataEraseError.message: Some unexpected error occurred, please try again later!

Settings_DataErased.message: All your data was removed from Mate servers!

Settings_EnableSync.message: Enable synchronization of history and the Phrasebook

Settings_EraseConfirm.message: Are you sure? This will erase all your synchronized translations and Phrasebook (local data will not be affected). This cannot be undone.

Settings_EraseDataDesc.message: According to GDPR, you can request your data to be removed from the Mate servers.

Settings_Interface_Autocorrection_Descri.message: Mate will automatically correct misspelled words.

Settings_Interface_InstantTranslation_De.message: Mate will translate the input when you end typing.

Settings_Interface_Save_Description.message: Mate will keep the last translation made in the pop up, so it's there when you open it again.

Settings_Interface_ShowIPA_Description.message: Learn how to pronounce with the international phonetic alphabet (IPA).

Settings_Interface_ShowTranslit_Descript.message: For non-Latin alphabets, Mate will show you a Latin transcription of the translation for easier reading.

Settings_NetflixDesc.message: Click on words in Netflix's subtitles to translate right there.

Settings_NoConsentPro.message: According to GDPR, we can't charge you for Pro version until you accept our terms of use... Accept it and refresh this page to proceed with Pro.

Settings_NoProSync.message: Upgrade to Pro to enable synchronization

Settings_PopupShortcutsDesc.message: Translate text in the input field with a shortcut.

Settings_ProActivated.message: You're all set! Pro has been activated.

Settings_ProFeature8_Desc.message:
Due to amount of requests, we only offer email support to Pro users.
You can find answers to most questions in Help Center otherwise.

Settings_RevokeConsent.message: i don't agree to terms anymore

Settings_RevokeConsentDesc.message: If you don't agree to our Privacy Policy or Terms of Use anymore, you can revoke your previous consent. However, you won't be able to use Mate anymore, too.

Settings_ShareDesc.message: Send them a link or share on social media. It will go a long way in supporting us!

Settings_ShareText.message: Mate is an all-in-one translator for {{platform}}, Mac and iOS. Learn and translate 103 languages. Fast and convenient. Available everywhere.

Settings_ShortcutClick.message: click on this field and then press a desired shortcut...

Settings_SyncText.message: Keep your translations and Phrasebook synchronized between all devices.

Settings_TooltipDesc.message: How big the tooltip where translations on web pages appear should be.

Settings_TranslateSelectionDesc.message: Show a translation button next to the selected text on web pages.

Settings_Translation_History_Description.message: Save all translations to browse through them at any time.

Settings_Translation_KeyCombos_Descripti.message: Select text on any page (except for PDF files), press a shortcut and get the translation right away in an unobtrusive pop-up window in front of you.

Settings_UsageDesc.message:
We recommend you to upgrade to Pro if you are translating over 500 times per month. It helps us maintain our server side.

Thus, we can guarantee a faster speed of translation.

Sync_NetworkError.message: It seems that there's no Internet connection. Please connect to the Internet and try to synchronize again.

Sync_NotSignedInError.message: You need to be signed in to synchronize your history and the Phrasebook.

There_Is_Localised_Site.message: Check the localized version of the site

Tooltip_DisableDoubleClickDesc.message: You won't see a translation window when you double-click on a word again.

Tooltip_DisableSelectionDesc.message: You won't see a floating translation button when you select text again.

Tour_Agree.message: Click on the button below to agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, and start translating with Mate.

Tour_DoubleClickDesc.message: Double-click on any word to see instant translation on web pages.

Tour_HowToContext.message: Or select any text and use the context menu (right-click) to see the translation.

Tour_HowToPopUp.message: If you need to type in some words by yourself, just open the pop-up window by clicking on the Mate button next to your browser address bar.

Tour_HowToSelect.message: Select any word or text on any webpage and press Shift+T to get it translated.

Tour_ImportantSub.message: This page will show you how to use Mate Translate

Tour_ImportantText.message: Take just 40 seconds to look through it

Tour_LangsDesc.message: Pick the language you want to translate to:

Tour_MacUser.message: I was using Mate for Mac

Tour_NoShiftT.message:
Mate can't translate selected text on this page and in PDF files because of certain technical restrictions of <%=browser%>.

Please try doing it on this page, for instance.

Tour_PDFDesc.message: Select text in PDF files within Chrome, right-click and translate it.

Tour_PDFNote.message: Floating button and Shift+T translations won't work in PDFs because of technical restrictions.

Tour_PagesDesc.message:
Translate entire web pages easily.
Just right-click & select "Translate this page" to do this.

Tour_PhrasebookDesc.message:
Save all words you want to remember in Mate Phrasebook.
Keep all your vocabulary in one place!

Tour_PhrasebookFeature.message: Keep all words you want to remember in one place!

Tour_ProCTA.message: Also unlock these awesome features by upgrading to Mate Pro right now:

Tour_SelectedDesc.message: Select and click on the floating button or press Shift+T to translate on any web page.

Tour_ShortcutsFeature.message: Create as many shortcuts as you need (vs 1 in the free version) for different languages to translate on web pages.

Tour_SyncDesc.message: Your translation history and Phrasebook will be synchronized between all devices where you're using Mate.

Tour_TranslationsFeature.message: Translate as many times as you need at any time.

Tour_UnlockDesc.message: Such as speech translation, unlimited translation shortcuts, unlimited phrasebook, synchronization.

Tour_UnlockDescSafari.message:
Get a lifelong version to always have an ultimate
translation mate in Safari.

Window_DoYouLikeDesc.message: Does something need improvement or is Mate nearly perfect for you?

Window_RateUsDesc.message: Would you probably take a minute to rate us on the App Store? It will go a long way in supporting us.
